name: TRICKERY
description:
Note: This game was made in late 2018, and reuploaded to itch.io on 2019. Development has halted indefinitively.

TRICKERY Is a first person game where you control different "crystals" that offer utility and combat abilities.

CONTROLS: W, A, S, D to move. Space - Jump. Shift - Run. Q, 1, 2, 3 - Change crystal.

This is a student project, and virtually, my first proper game, done completely by myself (with help from wonderful people, of course). 

Please take into account some features like pausing, saving and the options menu are missing, as well as content that had to be cut from this early release. (enemies, weapon combos).

Thanks for checking TRICKERY out!
